trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> event when an Insert button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template is clicked, and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control updates the record at the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>事件中的插入按钮时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>单击模板时后,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件更新数据源处的记录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (An Insert button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Insert".) The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> event enables you to perform a custom action, such as retrieving auto-generated values from the database for the inserted item.
trans-unit.target: (插入按钮是的按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"插入"。)<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>事件使您可以执行自定义操作，例如从为插入项数据库中检索自动生成的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>

trans-unit.source: A ListViewInsertedEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of items inserted and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: ListViewInsertedEventArgs 对象传递给事件处理方法，使您能够确定插入的项的数目和可能发生的任何异常。

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of items affected by the insert operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定插入操作所影响的项的数目，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether an exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性来确定是否发生了异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常的事件处理方法中通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you have to access the field values of the inserted item that were sent to the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要访问已发送至数据源，使用插入的项的字段值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template after an insert operation, which enables users to add values for a new item to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制清除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>后插入操作，这使得用户能够添加新项要插入的值的模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs during the insert operation, you can keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control in insert mode by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在插入操作期间发生异常，则可以保留<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件在插入模式下设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This rebinds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template to the values from the previous attempt to insert an item.
trans-unit.target: 此重新绑定次数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>从以前的尝试将项插入到值的模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the ListViewInsertedEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: ListViewInsertedEventArgs 类的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs>的新实例

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时引发事件主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> object that is contained in the `e` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|Initialized to `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>|Initialized to `false`.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|值`affectedRows`参数。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|中包含的<xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName>对象`e`参数。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|初始化为`false`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>|初始化为`false`。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> </xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 插入操作所影响的行数。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is raised when the insert operation was performed, if any.
trans-unit.target: 执行时将引发插入操作时，如果任何异常。

trans-unit.source: If no exception was raised, use <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不引发任何异常，则使用<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>为此参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取插入操作所影响的行的数。

trans-unit.source: Use the AffectedRows property to determine the number of records that were affected by the insert operation, as returned by the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AffectedRows 属性以确定返回的数据源控件的插入操作中，受影响的记录数。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used in the following scenarios: - To verify that only a single record was inserted.
trans-unit.target: 此属性一般用于在以下方案:-若要验证是否已插入单个记录。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an incorrectly written insert statement can insert multiple records.
trans-unit.target: 有时，编写不正确的 insert 语句可以插入多个记录。

trans-unit.source: - To verify that a record was not inserted because an error occurred during the insert operation, but an exception was not raised.
trans-unit.target: -若要验证的插入操作期间出错，但不是引发了异常，因为已不插入一条记录。

trans-unit.source: - To verify that a record was inserted when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency) has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: -若要验证是否已插入一条记录，当支持冲突检测 （乐观并发） 的数据源控件具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`枚举值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls that supports this property include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls.
trans-unit.target: 支持此属性的控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When the property has this value, a record might not be inserted if it has the same key value as a record inserted by another user.
trans-unit.target: 当属性具有此值时，如果它已由另一个用户插入的记录相同的密钥值，可能不能插入一条记录。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 插入操作所影响的行数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取的异常 （如果有） 插入操作过程中引发。

trans-unit.source: If an exception was raised and you handle the exception in the event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果引发了异常，并且事件处理程序中，设置中处理的异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件重新引发的异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The exception that was raised during the insert operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no exception was raised.
trans-unit.target: 在插入操作时，引发的异常或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果未不引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the insert operation was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在插入操作期间引发的异常处理在事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When an exception is raised during the insert operation, use the ExceptionHandled property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 在插入操作期间引发异常时，请使用 ExceptionHandled 属性指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，将异常认为是进行处理并且不会重新引发。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件重新引发的异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To determine which exception was raised, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定引发哪个异常，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果异常已处理在事件处理程序;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user's input values are preserved for the controls inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate*> template.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户的输入值会保留，以便在控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate*>模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control resets the control's values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template to their default values after an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件将从控件的值重置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>为其默认值插入操作后的模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This enables users to add values for a new item to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 这使用户能够添加新项要插入的值。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is raised during the insert operation, you can keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control in insert mode by setting the KeepInInsertMode property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在插入操作期间引发异常，则可以保留<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>KeepInInsertMode 属性设置为在插入模式中的控件`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This maintains the values from the previous attempt to insert an item for the controls inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: 此选项从以前尝试插入某个项内的控件的值将维持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user's input values are preserved for the controls inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate*> template; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the user's input values are replaced with the default values for the controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户的输入的值会保留，以便在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate*>模板; 内的控件<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果用户的输入值将替换控件的默认值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets field name/value pairs for the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: 获取字段名称/值对插入的记录。

trans-unit.source: Use the Values property to access the values of the fields for the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: 值属性用于访问插入的记录的字段的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of inserted records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用这些值来记录插入的记录。

trans-unit.source: The Values property returns an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: 值属性返回<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>实现对象<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>接口。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the fields of the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>对象包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>表示插入的记录的字段的对象。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: To access the field names, use the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的字段名称，使用<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>对象。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can access the field values by using the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 同样，通过使用访问的字段值<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>对象来访问该字段值直接。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回字段值。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) can access field values only by index.
trans-unit.target: 数据源的字段顺序所依赖的控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) 只能按索引访问字段值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The field name/value pairs for the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: 字段名称/值对插入的记录。
